channel.title: Running RSCAngel
channel.description:
I got the login server running fine, but the actual server does not start up.
Heres the Error: [IMG]http://i451.photobucket.com/albums/qq238/Kodekit/Rscangelrun.png[/img]
I'm using run_server.bat with this: [code]set java_path=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21 set RSCD=C:\Users\Miksu\Desktop\RSCAngel\F2P_RSCD\RSCD %java_path -Xms128m -Xmx2048m -classpath %RSCD\lib\mina.jar;%RSCD\lib\pircbot.jar;%RSCD\lib\bsh.jar;%RSCD\lib\xpp3.jar;%RSCD\lib\slf4j.jar;%RSCD\lib\xstream.jar;%RSCD\lib\mysql-connector.jar;%RSCD\lib\hex-string.jar;%RSCD\conf\server\quests;%RSCD\rscd.jar rsca.gs.Server world.xml p2p yes yes[/code]
The java path is right.
As you can see, I have rscd.jar and RSCD folder in the server's main folder. In the RSCD folder I have the rscd.jar's files. (I extracted them to there)

item.title: Running RSCAngel
item.dc:creator: @Stealmojo Stealmojo
item.description:
@Stealmojo wrote:

make sure p2p in your build.xml is set for p2p and not f2p also try this for running the server.

@echo off ant runp2p pause

Read full topic

item.title: Running RSCAngel
item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

I got the login server running fine, but the actual server does not start up.

Heres the Error:

Rscangelrun.png767×792

I’m using run_server.bat with this:

set java_path=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21 set RSCD=C:\Users\Miksu\Desktop\RSCAngel\F2P_RSCD\RSCD %java_path -Xms128m -Xmx2048m -classpath %RSCD\lib\mina.jar;%RSCD\lib\pircbot.jar;%RSCD\lib\bsh.jar;%RSCD\lib\xpp3.jar;%RSCD\lib\slf4j.jar;%RSCD\lib\xstream.jar;%RSCD\lib\mysql-connector.jar;%RSCD\lib\hex-string.jar;%RSCD\conf\server\quests;%RSCD\rscd.jar rsca.gs.Server world.xml p2p yes yes

The java path is right.

As you can see, I have rscd.jar and RSCD folder in the server’s main folder.
In the RSCD folder I have the rscd.jar’s files. (I extracted them to there)

Read full topic
